title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!
author: Adi Tantimedh

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch
description: In today's BCTV Daily Dispatch: James Gunn/DCU/Superman/Henry Cavill, Superman & Lois, SNL, The Sandman, The Nevers/#Westworld & tons more!
author: Ray Flook

title: Law & Order: Organized Crime Makes Us Fear That [Spoiler] Is a Goner, Then Hints at the Death of a Different Stabler — Read Recap
description: If the Stablers don’t already have a punch card at their local hospital, they should — because by this point, they’d surely be eligible for a free IV or something. Elliot and his family spend a good chunk of this week’s Law & Order: Organized Crime milling about the emergency room, waiting to hear whether Bernie […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Andor Spies a New High on Nielsen Streaming Top 10, Daredevil: Born Again Has Still Yet to Chart
description: Netflix’s YOU repeated atop Nielsen’s U.S. ranking of streaming originals for the week of April 28, amassing nearly 1.8 billion minutes viewed across 50 total episodes. In its first week of eligibility, Netflix’s The Four Seasons made its chart debut in the No. 2 spot with 1.3 billion minutes viewed/eight episodes, followed by Disney+’s Andor […]
author: Matt Webb Mitovich
